title: Ticket #5486: Change --instances to --cores.
description:
Right now, condor_annex sizes things based on instances, rather than cores, but cores are (generally) what our users care about. This is especially egregious when specifying instance types with different core counts. We should accept --cores (instead of --instaces) and convert internally, including when assigning instance type counts. (Continue to assign round-robin, just do so with an increment of core-count, rather than 1.)

(This last will irritate a bunch of people, but we need to figure out our position on bidding and/or pricing cleverness before we do anything else.)
remarks:
2016-Aug-25 11:25:07 by tlmiller:
Abandoning as specific to the prototype. (The daemon already allows a 'weight' specification to determine how many cores -- or whatever -- a given instance type supplies.)
